name: Caipirinha Black
description: Caipirinha is a Cape Verdan cocktail prepared with black vodka, refined sugar, and lime. CA variation of the classic Caipirinha which uses a black vodka, to create a unique looking concoction.
directions: Place lime and sugar into Old-Fashioned glass and muddle.
Mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon.
Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Black Vodka.
